title: [Twelve Oaks Manor, Entry]
description: Two elegant crystal chandeliers hang from the vaulted ceiling, while a set of deep bay windows, complete with thickly cushioned seats, flank an immense fireleaf door.  Moonlight streaming through the windows illuminates the polished blonde oak floor and a broad silk tapestry that covers much of the eastern wall.  A bas-relief panel, depicting a garden scene, graces the western end of the northern enclosure of the room.
